item.title: Spark Summit 2021
item.description: Project Zen: Making Data Science Easier in PySpark Project Zen Goals: make spark more pythonic better ops with python libraries Changes: Python Hints better documentation support conda, pip, pipex to deploy package Shipping pacakge in conda pandas Api on Spark visualization Links: Project Zen Databricks Blog

item.title: Model Interpretability
item.description:
Understanding and being able to justify what your machine learning model has learned is very important.

In this post, I cover :

  • understanding model by their weights
  • understanding how individiual feature interact through partial dependency plots
  • justifying individual predictions using Shap and Lime

item.title: SSH Tunneling
item.description:
Sometimes, you want to access a service running on a remote server, but there might be a firewall that does not forward the traffic to the port.

One way to deal with this is to create a socks proxy.
